text: In a Lonely Place is a 1950 American romantic drama movie directed by Nicholas Ray and based on the 1947 novel of the same name by Dorothy B. Hughes. It stars Humphrey Bogart, Gloria Grahame, Frank Lovejoy, Martha Stewart, Robert Warwick and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1950 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies directed by Nicholas Ray Category:Movies based on books Category:Film noir Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: In a Lonely Place
